This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://github.com/phenopackets/core-ig/CodeSystem/hpo
    CodeDisplay
    HP:0012823
  • Include codes from http://github.com/phenopackets/core-ig/CodeSystem/hpo where concept is-a HP:0012824
